topic.title: Git Center - an alternative to GitHub
0Play Game Center
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Ag6xidDHiPgWoDKhfSx4xFQr6WC3NqxZg/

To login, one have to download [PeerMessage plugin](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/Plugin-PeerMessage/archive/master.zip) and after extracting to the plugins folder (on Windows in ZeroNet/core/plugins/) restart Zeronet. [More info.](http://127.0.0.1:43110/peeper.bit/?Post/12h51ug6CcntU2aiBjhP8Ns2e5VypbWWtv/12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu/1535624559)

1_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di.body:
> [axeltherabbit](#comment_8_1CGweCTCsFxD5FjvciBaGagZXsAUbXustF): Have you fixed the upload issue?

I thought I fixed it. But, if I haven't let's test it again. I've added some logs, so a warning may appear after uploading. Does it?

1535862457_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body:
> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_27_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): I click chess, it says: "Please wait till someone wants to play." [...]

Sounds like a good idea.

1566347337_1CgdRv2BFaVqNfmK3qGVYDuA7EDmk.body: Hey, that's a cool site! Thanks!

> [anshorei](#comment_1_1CgdRv2BFaVqNfmK3qGVYDuA7EDmk8dJVS): I do now. I'm glad people appreciate the site. Feel free to suggest articles, events and other relevant material to add. [...]

I'll find the date right now, wait a sec

> [anshorei](#comment_1_1CgdRv2BFaVqNfmK3qGVYDuA7EDmk8dJVS): I do now. I'm glad people appreciate the site. Feel free to suggest articles, events and other relevant material to add. [...]

The exploit was found in the wild on Sep 27, 2018, the fix and the PoC were released on Sep 30, 2018. BTW, I think something is wrong with the "—8/3/2019—8Chan down" text.

> [anshorei](#comment_1_1CgdRv2BFaVqNfmK3qGVYDuA7EDmk8dJVS): I do now. I'm glad people appreciate the site. Feel free to suggest articles, events and other relevant material to add. [...]

You can get more info [on the PoC site](/1HcLPSR5ss1ehsqP8kU2Sa2TJyDVcGADTp/).
